article: Mrs. Scott and her husband are both  _  . They teach in the same school. They go to school  by car  . They leave home at eight o'clock in the morning. And they  get back  home at four o'clock in the afternoon. Sam Scott and his sister Ann are  _  . Sam  goes to school  by bus, and Ann goes to school  on foot  .Some of  _  friends walk to school, too. Sam and Ann get home at four o'clock in the afternoon. They  do their homework  before dinner, and they watch TV  _  dinner. They usually  go to bed  early, especially on school nights.
